changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE accounts ( id BIGINT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, uuid VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL, name VARCHAR(256), type varchar(256), industry VARCHAR(256), phone VARCHAR(256), website VARCHAR(256), addition_phone VARCHAR(256), description VARCHAR(256), account_owner VARCHAR(36), updated_by VARCHAR(256), created_by BIGINT, updated_at TIMESTAMP, created_at TIMESTAMP, status VARCHAR(256), is_deleted TINYINT );
